\end"},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/new-lifestory":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/new-lifestory","code-body":"yes","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define create-new-lifestory() <$let mode={{{[get[text]] :else[[resume]] }}} new-lifestory-title= {{{ [match[resume]thenelse] }}} new-lifestory-tags = {{{ [match[resume]then[Resume]else[Academic CV]format:titlelist[]] }}} new-lifestory-content={{{ [match[resume]thenelse]}}} > <$action-sendmessage $message=tm-new-tiddler title=<> tags=<> type="application/json" text=<> /> \end \define new-resume-content() { "sections":"profiles experience skills education languages interests awards certificates projects publications media organizations references", "basics":"[tag[Basics]]", "profiles":"[tag[Profiles]]", "education":"[tag[Education]]", "experience":"[tag[Experience]]", "skills":"[tag[Skills]]", "awards":"[tag[Awards]]", "certificates":"[tag[Certificates]]", "languages":"[tag[Languages]]", "interests":"[tag[Interests]]", "organizations":"[tag[Organizations]]", "publications":"[has[bibtex-author]!sort[bibtex-year]limit[10]]", "media":"[tag[Media]]", "projects":"[tag[Projects]]", "references":"[tag[References]]", "template":"plain", "remarks":"This is a private note on this resume" } \end \define new-academic-cv-content() { "sections":"profiles experience skills education languages interests awards certificates projects publications media organizations references", "basics":"[tag[Basics]]", "profiles":"[tag[Profiles]]", "education":"[tag[Education]]", "experience":"[tag[Experience]]", "skills":"[tag[Skills]]", "awards":"[tag[Awards]]", "certificates":"[tag[Certificates]]", "languages":"[tag[Languages]]", "interests":"[tag[Interests]]", "organizations":"[tag[Organizations]]", "publications":"[has[bibtex-author]!sort[bibtex-year]limit[10]]", "media":"[tag[Media]]", "projects":"[tag[Projects]]", "references":"[tag[References]]", "template":"plain", "remarks":"This is a private note on this resume" } \end \define key-order() sections basics profiles education experience skills awards certificates languages interests organizations publications media projects references template remarks"},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/publications":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/publications","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Negar/Macro","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define     <$let new-item-title={{{[{!!caption}trim:end[s]]}}} new-item-tags={{{ [{!!caption}format:titlelist[]] [] :and[join[ ]]}}} > <$importvariables filter="[[$:/tags/Negar/Record]tagging[]contains{!!caption}]:else$:/plugins/kookma/negar/records/default"> <$button class="btn btn-sm"actions=<>> New <$text text=<>/>
    <$reveal type=match state=<> text=yes default=no> <$macrocall label=""tempTiddler=<>$name=search-box/>
    <$let searchTerm={{{[get[text]]}}}> <$count filter="[{!!caption}tagging[]search:title]"/> records <$list filter="[{!!caption}tagging[]search:title]"template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain/awards":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain/awards","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Negar/Macro]]
    ''{{##title}}'', {{##awarder}}
    {{##date}}
    {{##summary}}
    "},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain/basics":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain/basics","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define items() to-be-used

    ''{{##name}}'' ({{##level}}): <>
    "},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain","caption":"plain","code-body":"yes","tags":"$:/tags/Negar/Template","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define sectionTemplate() $:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain/$(section)$ \define display-one-section()

    <$text text={{{ [
    uppercase[]] }}} />

    <$list filter="[
    !match[publications]]" variable=ignore> <$list filter=<> template=<> /> <$list filter="[
    match[publications]]" variable=ignore> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/negar/templates/plain/publications" /> \end <$let section="basics" section-filter={{{ [getindex
    ] }}} num-records={{{ [subfilterfirst[]has[title]]:and[!is[draft]] :and[count[]] }}}> <$list filter="[!match[0]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="''Warning'': The basic (personal) info is missing"> <$list filter="[subfilterfirst[]]" template=<> /> <$list filter="[subfilter{##sections}lowercase[]remove[basics]]" variable=section> <$let section-filter={{{ [getindex
    ] }}} num-records={{{ [subfilterhas[title]]:and[!is[draft]] :and[count[]] }}}> <$list filter="[!match[0]]" variable=ignore> <> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/ui/Button/new-lifestory":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/ui/Button/new-lifestory","caption":"{{$:/plugins/kookma/negar/images/people-resume}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Negar/NewResume/Caption}}","description":"{{$:/language/Buttons/Negar/NewResume/Hint}}","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [[$:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/definition]][[$:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/new-lifestory]] \whitespace trim <$button class=<> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Negar/NewResume/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Negar/NewResume/Caption}} actions=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/negar/images/people-resume}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Negar/NewResume/Caption}}/> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/ui/ControlPanel/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/ui/ControlPanel/Settings","caption":"Negar","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab $:/tags/MoreSideBar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"These settings let you customise the behaviour of Negar Resume Builder plugin. --- ;Show Negar plugin settings in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/negar/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar ;Options :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/negar/styles/edittemplate" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Show fields and type selector for Record and Resume tiddlers :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/Negar/Stabs/EnableSearch" field=text checked=yes> Enable searchbox on section tabs"},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/ui/sidebar":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/ui/sidebar","caption":"Resume Builder","tags":"$:/tags/SideBar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/definition \import $:/plugins/kookma/negar/macros/set-builder-mode
    <$macrocall $name="set-builder-mode" /> <$let mode={{{[get[text]] :else[[resume]] }}} > <$macrocall $name=tabs tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Negar/Section]!is[draft]contains] -[indexes[]]"class="tc-vertical tc-sidebar-tabs-more"default="$:/plugins/kookma/negar/tabs/profiles"/> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/utility/templates/text":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/utility/templates/text","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$text text=<> />"},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/viewtemplates/life-story":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/viewtemplates/life-story","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$let template-name={{{ [getindex[template]] :else[[plain]] }}} template-tiddler={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Negar/Template]contains:caption] }}} > <$transclude tiddler=<> field=text/> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/viewtemplates/record":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/negar/viewtemplates/record","list-before":"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define multiline-fields() summary reference description \define input-row(tiddler, index, label, placeholder, tag)
  • <$transclude tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> index=<<__index__>> />
    • \end
      <$let template-filter="[list] :intersection[<..currentTiddler>get[tags]enlist-input[]]" key-order={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Negar/Record]] :filter[subfilter] :map[get[key-order]] }}} > <$list filter="[indexes[]sortby]" variable=index> <$macrocall $name=input-row tiddler=<> index=<> label={{{ [titlecase[]split[.]join[ ]] }}} tag={{{ [enlistmatchthen[textarea]else[input]] }}} placeholder="" />
    "}}}
